name: Controllusion
description:
An angel finds himself imprisoned in chains. He's in pain, he can't spread his wings.

“How could they do this to me!?” Michael screams into the void. He is angry. He is furious. Not long ago he was in Heaven, and now he's fallen... suddenly, Michael hears footsteps coming his way. The angel lost everything: his honor, his dignity, and his life.

Michael was betrayed, but by whom? Good luck finding the traitor.

Controls:

•  WSAD are moving keys;

•  SpaceBar is jumping key;

•  Ctrl is [lost bounding error] key;

•  LMB is attacking key;

•  RBM is hook-key.

Win condition:

Find the way out of Hell.
